Key Match Events: Randal Kolo Muani's mishit shot was deflected into the goal by Jan Vertonghen, resulting in France's 1-0 victory over Belgium.
Theo Hernandez made a notable tackle on Yannick Carrasco.
Mike Maignan made a strong save against a long shot from Kevin De Bruyne.
Post-Match Reflections: Didier Deschamps emphasized the importance of the victory despite the lackluster performance.
The match was compared to the 2018 World Cup semi-final where Belgium also struggled against France's defense.
The article reflects on France's ability to win despite not playing attractively, likening them to Germany in the 1980s and 1990s.
